block.p: KANAREK-David. The Yeshiva University family mourns the untimely passing of a wonderful young man, the beloved son of Joseph and Robin Kanarek and brother of Sara, and cherished grandson of Bella Kanarek and YU Benefactors Carl and Dorothy Bennett, who established the Carl and Dorothy Bennett Chair in Pastoral Counseling at our Wurzweiler School of Social Work in tribute to Rabbi Joseph H. Ehrenkranz, and the Carl and Dorothy Bennett Scholarship Fund at our Sy Syms School of Business. We extend heartfelt condolences to the entire family. May they be comforted among the mourners of Zion and Jerusalem. Dr. Norman Lamm, President Yeshiva University Robert M. Beren, Chairman Board of Trustees

May they be comforted among the mourners of Zion and Jerusalem. Dr. Norman Lamm, President Yeshiva University Robert M. Beren, Chairman Board of Trustees
